questions.question_text: Which statement accurately describes adding a dashboard layout for a mobile device?

choices.D: Dashboard changes made for one device layout apply to other device layouts.
choices.B: Dashboard device layout changes will be saved between workbooks.
choices.A: Dashboards designed in portrait mode are optimal for viewing on a phone.
choices.C: Only workbooks published to Tableau Online support mobile layouts.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Dashboards designed in portrait mode are optimal for viewing on a phone.

Selected Answer: A
A correct portrait for mobile and landscape for tablet

choices.C: To allow for easier exporting to Power Point.
choices.B: Provide additional editing and interactive capabilities to your audience.
choices.D: Assemble a sequenced analysis to share with collaborators.
choices.A: Present a data narrative to lead your audience to your conclusions.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
A. Present a data narrative to lead your audience to your conclusions.
D. Assemble a sequenced analysis to share with collaborators.

Selected Answer: AD
A and D , probably C is find also

Selected Answer: AD
https://help.tableau.com/current/pro/desktop/en-us/stories.htm

Selected Answer: D
https://help.tableau.com/current/pro/desktop/en-us/stories.htm
not sure about other option

choices.A: Select Format on the menu, and then select Title and Caption.
choices.B: Select Format on the menu, and then select Font.
choices.D: Right-click the title in a view, and then select Format Title.
choices.C: Double-click the title in a particular view and use the dialog box.

questions.question_text: What two methods can you use to change the font of a worksheet title? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Affect the formatting options in the view
choices.B: Affect the level of detail in the view

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABD
A. Contain qualitative values
B. Affect the level of detail in the view
D. Can be continuous or discrete
ABD is right answer

Selected Answer: ABD
ABD are correct
ABD, for D, let's say [Date] field.

Selected Answer: ABD

questions.question_text: Which three statements accurately describe dimensions? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
To edit a categorical color legend:
Right-click (Control-click on Mac) the legend and select Edit Colors.

Select a data item in the list on the left, and then select a new color in the palette on the right.

Click OK.

Selected Answer: D
https://help.tableau.com/current/reader/desktop/en-us/colors.htm
